11221.content: World renowned explorer Lara Croft was in the middle of her latest adventure. The legends told that whoever found this artifact could become younger for as long as they want. Lara was in search of the fabled...
11221.title: Lara's new adventure

choices: Store it in jugs and bring them home
112211.content: Lara Croft had finally discovered the fabled fountain of youth. She knew how important this discovery was. Lara couldn't believe it. No one had to worry about getting older or dying. Lara then decided to..
112211.title: Tomb Raider and the fountain of youth

1122111.content: Lara had just celebrated her 38th birthday the previous week; she wasn't excited about being nearly 40. She thought it would be better for the moment to test the fountain's powers on herself; she could stand to loose some years of her body. Lara then wondered how she was going to do it. Lara decided to get younger by..
1122111.title: Lara's Youthfull Thoughts

11221112.content: Lara Took her Canteen and figured a bath in it would be risky. She filled the canteen up to the top with the youthful substance. "this better make me younger, but not too young." Lara raised the canteen and took a small swig of Fountain water. "Mmm...Tastes good." She said waiting for the effects. "Must take a while to work." What now?
11221112.title: Youthful Experiences.

112211122.content: "I'll see what happens" she said sitting down, there were no weird feelings, but she noticed her shirt was looser and she felt lighter. "Wow! its working!" She stood up and found that her shirt was loosening and her legs were tightening, and best of all, she felt light as a bird! She found a mirror and looked at herself, She was now the Beutiful age of 20! "Wow. This stuff really works! She said, holding the mirror up and down. this is amazing! She tought.
112211122.title: Wait for the effects.

1122111221.content:
When Lara got home, she sat down and her clothes were VERY loose; she remembered that when you get younger, things don't get younger with you. She chuckled. She also noticed her legs dangled a bit as she sat on her chair. She swayed them back and forth, and hit the canteen! It toppled over and landed on her leg! "Oh no!" she said, the bottle spilling all over her.

When she managed to clean it up, the effects took place. Very slowly, she started getting younger and younger. While she sat on the chair, he feet got higher and higher off the ground, and her clothes started hanging off her. She struggled to get off the chair and into the bathroom. When she got there, her underwear had fallen off under her. She could barely see into the mirror, and the counter to her was huge! She got a stool and climbed up onto the counter, with a lot of strength, as a child, Lara was short for her age. When she got up, she noticed that her T-shirt had fallen off too, leaving her in her Baggy pants and bra. She peered into the mirror and saw a 13 year old Lara staring back at her. "Oh my god." she covered her mouth realizing she was higher pitch now.
1122111221.title: Home at Last.

112222221211.title: Gym Leader

choices: She is kidnapped by a mysterious team and regressed
1122222212111.content: One final question : How will she be regressed ?
1122222212111.title: Maylene

11222222121111.content:
Maylene, the barefoot fighting genius, was the young Gym Leader of Veilstone City. Her fighting Pokémon were a tough challenge for any trainer who wished to obtain her badge. She battles many of those trainers on a daily basis, and whether she won or lost, she and her Pokémon always enjoyed it, and learned a lot from their battles. However, her next fight was going to be very special, as it wasn't going to end traditionally. Her opponent didn't look that weird : he wore a labcoat and rather nerdy glasses, but Maylene had already fought many other scientists before, so that didn't strike her as odd. The only notable thing about him is that he looked so serious and quiet that he almost seemed to be mute. Before the young Gym Leader could engage a conversation with him, he raised him arm in front of him as of to say "Stop !" and grabbed a Poké Ball. Maylene was a bit confused, but she realized there was no point in trying to speak to him, and the battle began.

She sent out Lucario as her first Pokémon, while the challenger sent out a Hypno. Lucario was the first one to attack, but Hypno dodged easily, and countered by putting Lucario to sleep with Hypnosis. Maylene tried her best to wake her Pokémon friend up, but she was too focused on doing so to realize that the challenger's next attack was actually aimed at her. When she turned to Hypno, she realized that it was using Hypnosis again, but this time on her. Despite her efforts to resist the attack, Maylene lost consciousness and fell fast asleep.

When she woke up, she was a rather dark room, with very little light. She was strapped to what seemed like an operating table, and could not move an inch, much less reach down to her pocket to call one of her Pokémon for help. She struggled to try to break free, but to no avail. She took another look around, and noticed two important things : a window from which she could see the silhouettes of three people, and a huge, futuristic-looking ray gun that was aimed right at her. She was really scared, but she gathered the courage to try and yell at the shadowed people, hoping they would answer :

"Who are you, and why did you kidnap me ?! What do you want with me ?!"

She saw the three slihouettes move a bit, as if theye were talking to each other, then heard a man's voice over the loudspeaker :

"We are Team Chaos. We seek to seize control of the world, by capturing legendary Pokémon and using their power to make all of our enemies bow down to us. We are aware that many other teams before us have attempted to reach this goal and failed, but we do not rely solely on Pokémon. We also make great use of technology and weapons to dispose of humans who should stand in our way. The ray gun that you see before you is one of those weapons. It is a rejuvenating ray, meant to regress our enemies in age to render them harmless. It has not been tested yet, which is why you are here now. You shall be a test subject for this new weapon."

Maylene started to panic, and struggled even more to try and break free, but her efforts were useless. The ray gun started to glow a bright blue color, before firing a beam of intense light at the young Gym Leader. As soon as the beam of light struck her, her body started to shake violently as if she had been hit by lightning. She felt a rather intense pain throughout her body, and felt her consciousness drifting away as the beam was altering most of her mind. Her body was getting smaller by the second, and her clothes started to look huge on her. Her regression continued until she was...
11222222121111.title: She is kidnapped by a mysterious team and regre...

115111122.content: Sirens and Mechromancers and Moxxi, oh my!
115111122.title: Borderlands

choices: Go see Moxxi. She has a job for Maya.
Go visit the Eridian cave she discovered a while ago.
11511112211.content:
Maya awoke in her bunk in Sanctuary, in her own little apartment in the downstairs section of Roland's home. It was given to her after she and the other Vault Hunters had defeated Jack and Hyperion, and she was happy to not be sleeping in the same room as the snoring ox that was Salvador. She stood up and stretched, putting her hands up toward the ceiling. She walked over to her makeshift armory and began suiting up, equipping her shield, holstering her guns, placing her class mod on her hip and hanging her relic next to it. She walks out of her apartment and spots Tannis speaking into an ECHO, talking about something relating to the other Vaults. Tennis notices her and smiles that insane grin, then turned away and continued talking into the ECHO. Maya walked out of the home and checked her HUD for her to-do list.
On their HUD, she had two things to do, and she knew she would probably only have time to do one today.
Her objective today was...
11511112211.title: Maya

115111122111.content:
It obviously did not take long to cross the city of Sancuary considering how small the city was. Maya stepped through the main door of the bar, moving past several people and spotting Axton, who was standing at the bar with the hulking, diminutive form of El Salvador. They were talking about one thing or another, and upon closer inspection, they were talking about raiding a bandit hideout, one in Three Horns and which actually had bandits worth fighting. Not that a Gunzerker couldn't handle them, of course.
Maya stopped next to the bar. Moxxi moved away from the two other Vault Hunters and leaned against the counter in front of Maya.
"Hey, sugar," the busty bartender greeted with a seductive tone in her voice and a matching smile, "You here about that job?"
"Yeah," Maya replied, placing her hands on her hips, "What is the job?"
Moxxi pushed off the counter and gestured to the door to the side of the bar, and she disappeared through a door herself. Maya lowered her eyebrows, but she did as she was instructed and moved to the door. She moved up the staircase there and then into the door on the landing.
She entered a room that looked surprisingly luxurious. It has an ECHOVISION installed on one wall and a black couch across from the EV. There was a very large bed with a canopy and plenty of posters, as well as a dartboard with a photo of Handsome Jack and darts put through it. Moxxi was already there, waiting against the bed.
"Alright, what's the job?" Maya asked, placing her hands on her hips again and standing parallel to Moxxi, who pressed one hip out and put a hand on that hip, allowing the other arm to hang slack.
"Well, I have two," Moxxi said, "Do you want to hear about..."
115111122111.title: Go see Moxxi. She has a job for Maya.

1151111221111.content: Is Maya going to retrieve a gun?
1151111221111.title: The Retrieval Job

1151111221111222.content: Only two more things: Grenade Mod or Class Mod?
1151111221111222.title: No

choices: That she would accept Zero's offer and go with him and Gaige.
Who needs help? She's a Siren that's armed to the teeth!
11511112211112221.content:
(I shoulda made this the first option!)

"Let's hear about the retrieval job," Maya answered, moving to stand directly in front of Moxxi.
"There's a new girl in town that's stealing all of my clients, and when I say all, I mean all," Moxxi explains.
"And you want me to kill her?" Maya asked, fingering the Maliwan revolver at her hip.
"No, no. I would like to see if I can convince her to...have a partnership, as it were, maybe get her to make a joint business with me. I want you to see if you can find out how she has an advantage over me in this biz."
"Where is she? And how might I do that?" Maya crossed her arms over her chest.
"She lives in the Highlands, in the town of Overlook. The town's gotten quite large now, so you might need to ask a few of the men there where she lives. Her name is LuLu."
Maya nodded, saying, "Okay. I'll be back when I'm done with the job."
"Before you go," Moxxi said just as Maya reached the door, "A good place to look would be her house. You might need to check and see where that is."
Maya nodded again and left the room, but as the door slammed shut, she felt a presence behind her. She whipped around, drawing her Maliwan Slag SMG.
Zero was leaning against the wall, his arms crossed and one foot against the wall behind him.
"I understand Mad Moxxi wants you to check out LuLu the Prostitute."
"What's it to you?" Maya asked, holstering her SMG and placing her hands on her hips.
"Gaige and I are going to Overlook as well. Perhaps you would like assistance."
Maya thought for a moment, then decided...
11511112211112221.title: The Retrieval Job (Class Mod)

choices: Try someone else from this universe.
11522.content: Pokemon Platinum does have different household objects as forms for Rotom. How about we do something like that to the resident Pokemon Diamond/Pearl/Platinum girl. Or we could turn her into a Drifloon or Drifblim, too.
11522.title: How about Dawn?

115221.content: It's funny how our choices here will give us a half-ghost pokemon no matter which way we go.
115221.title: Let's go with Dawn.

choices: She's pulled into the TV and transformed.
A rotom that's inside possesses her and leaves her with it's previous body.
1152211.content:
Out of curiosity, Dawn finds herself heading towards an old house in the Eterna Forest on her way to Eterna City. Not really seeing a reason why a small tree would block her path unless it was cut down, Dawn manages to force her way past them, getting her backpack tangled up and stuck in the process. Not knowing that the house was allegedly haunted, Dawn makes her way inside, hoping to find something to take care of the trees so she can get her backpack.

She flicks on a light switch, which causes the lights to come on for a second before a short in the wiring causes the few remaining fuses in the house to suddenly break. "Huh, so much for that...I wonder how old this place must be to still be..." she says. As she continues to explore, she hears a television producing static. "Now that's odd...maybe that room is still has electricity going to it."

Dawn enters the room to find nothing but the TV on. She tries the light switch, but the lights remain off. "Well, something still has to be powering that TV." She says to herself as she goes over to it and takes a look.
1152211.title: The Possessed TV

choices: She can become any electronic device she thinks of.
She can become any electronic device she touches.
11522111.content:
As Dawn gets close, she feels a sightly attractive force that soon becomes much stronger. Surprized, the young girl tries to pull away from it, but by the time she tries to the attraction is too strong for her to withstand. Making one last vain attempt to get away, Dawn falls forwards and is sucked into the TV head-first.

Dawn finds herself in the oddly spacious interior of the TV, surrounded by static. Before she has time to take in her surroundings, she starts to feel strange. "W-what's going on?" she stammers as she returns to coherence. Once her head stops spinning she finds that she's surrounded with a blue aura. Her skin also starts to become a shiny orange color, but it's only when she feels something going on with her arms and legs. She looks herself over and yelps as she sees her arms and legs growing shorter before her eyes, her arms being replaced by a couple bolts of electricity.

Once her arms and legs are completely gone, the rest of her body below her neck starts to become drawn in. While her hair is left alone, her head starts to grow completely round except for a spike jutting out of the top of her head. Her eyes become vertical ovals in shape, and as soon as they're finished changing shape, Dawn's body is completely gone, leaving only her head and neck, which has become like a small sphere below her head.

Not a moment later, Dawn is unceremoniously tossed out of the TV, which promptly fizzles a bit before the screen blows out of it, leaving Dawn in her transformed state, hovering a few feet off the ground.

She turns to the TV and looks it over, before saying something in Rotom-Poke-speak that literally translates to "Well, I guess I'm going to be stuck like this.", though her tone suggests that she's acutally indifferent. "I wonder what being a pokemon will be like, anyway, or more specifically, this pokemon. Hrum...could I be my own trainer? Would I need a pokeball?" She thinks to herself...
11522111.title: Stuck as a Rotom.

115221112.content: 'How am I going to work with this body?' Dawn levitated out of the room, wandering around the mansion. "What could I do with this body anyway?" She went around the mansion until she found a room that looked like a utility closet. Inside the room, there were five strangely orange-coloured appliances lying on the floor: a microwave oven, a washing machine, a refrigerator, a fan, and a lawn mower. There was also an old toy robot in the back, leaning up against the wall. Noticing these weird objects, Dawn decided to look at...
115221112.title: The Appliances and the Toy Robot

1152211121.content:
Those weird, orange, cordless appliances caught her attention first, so Dawn approached one of them to see exactly how they work without a direct source of electricity. She came up to the lawn mower and noticed a oddly-shaped hole where a motor should be. Curious about this abnormal spot, she went closer to try to get a better look at this machine, but as she was close to making contact with it, she got absorbed by the appliance, with her body taking on a new shape and aura. As soon as she became a lawn mower with a wide face, sharp teeth, green eyes, and a green aura, she accelerated her body by the shock (no pun intended) of becoming something else, hitting the wall very quickly.
         As she got thrown out by the impact, phasing through the wall, Dawn shook that moment off and said, "So that what they're for? Just so I can play them or something?" The moment she said that, she got a brilliant idea. "Let's see what I can do with those things," she said as she smirked. She went back into the room and took control of one of the appliances.

         Just what appliance did she possess?
1152211121.title: The Strange Motors

11522111212.content: After that bad moment, she didn't want the lawn mower again, so she took control of what?
11522111212.title: She possessed something else.

choices: She possessed one of the kitchen appliances.
115221112122.content: She thought she would be blown back against the wall if she took the fan, so she went with what?
115221112122.title: She possessed something else.

1152211121222.content: She thought that she'll start flooding the place if she took the washing machine, so she thought it would be best to go with one of the kitchen appliances. Just which one?
1152211121222.title: She possessed one of the kitchen appliances.

11522112.content: Just then, something jumped from the TV, making Dawn flinch. It was a Rotom, a Pokémon infamous for possessing electronics. Dawn had even heard rumors of them being able to possess other Pokémon, and people! "Finally, someone enters this dump after seven years!" Dawn can hear a voice say. She realizes it's coming from Rotom. "And such a cutie, too!" Rotom was now much closer to her, making its voice much more audible. "Don't mind if I do!" it said, and without warning, jumped into Dawn's body, leaving its small balloon-like form behind. Dawn's body began to fill with strange sensations, before she became light headed and blacked out. Upon waking up, she could see her own body. Its eyes now resembled those of a Rotom, with a horizontal line going through the middle. Dawn found that she was in that balloon-like form the Rotom once inhabited, and realized the Rotom had stolen her body. "Ah, so you're awake." Rotom said in its borrowed voice, making a slight smirk with its cute new face. Taking its hands off its breasts, it looked over at you, saying: "I could have just left you here, but I figured I owe you an explanation. I was a lot like you, a trainer. I came into this place and had my body stolen by a Rotom. I should've been able to live a normal teenage boy life, but no, it was taken away from me." Dawn shuddered at the thought of a boy her age inhabiting her body. "And now, after seven years, I see a cute girl wander in her all by herself. I didn't really want to be a girl, but hey, it beats being trapped in here. Besides, I'm now starting to see the benefits of being the fairer sex." He says, squeezing his new breasts once again.
11522112.title: The Possession

1252211.content: One night when everyone was asleep including Ash, Ash began to grow. By morning he was 1000 ft tall and was laying in the forest. He still had all his cloths on including his shoes that were now 62 ft tall. When he woke up he realized he had grown by a lot because he could see the next city with out even standing and that was still 5 days away. Without thinking about Brock and Misty he just continued and reached the city by noon. And then he was really hungry. So he went back to the forest and ate fruit trees and a lot of them. By then it was night and he went to sleep. What should he do tomorrow.
1252211.title: Big Ash

choices: She suddenly grew to 100 feet tall
12522221.content: Ash, May, Max, and Brock were walking through the forest and decided to stop for lunch. May decided to take a walk before lunch. While she was walking she found some odd berries. They looked good and she decided to eat them. On her way back her stomach felt funny. She decided it was nothing and went back for lunch. After lunch they started walking again. While they were walking max thought to himself "May looks taller than she usually does". While he was thinking of saying something, something odd happened to May...
12522221.title: Odd Berries

125222212.content: Suddenly May grew 100 feet tall and was taller than the trees. She and every one else noticed this and they all yelled. May picked them all up and brought them to eye level. 132.content: Zelda, Mario or another game?
132.title: Nintendo

1321.content:
It was just an ordinary day in Skyloft. Link had safely rescued Zelda, and they were celebrating. Everything was finally at peace there, and in the world below.

"Link I know you may not need them anymore, but I've created a new potion!" The potions lady told him at the Bazaar. "It has different effects depending on who it's used on!"

Link was looking for a gift to profess his love to Zelda. This might not be for Zelda, but he bought it anyway just because he might want to try it. He decided to buy her a beautiful necklace.

"Make sure you get that potion powered up by my husband! It will increase its effects."

Link does so, and heads home to the Knights Academy. It was getting late. He decides to go to bed. He wakes up in the middle of the night, unable to sleep. He was too excited to confess his love to Zelda. He decides to have some fun since he's up now anyway. He gets out his new potion and decides to give it to someone. But who?
1321.title: Zelda

choices: Changed him into a minion of Bowser's.
13221.content:
It was just an ordinary day in the Mushroom Kingdom. Mario was off to rescue Princess Peach. He had made it all the way to Bowser's Castle with Luigi. They were ready to fight Bowser and get back their Princess. They could hear Bowser's voice echo throughout the castle. "Try and get by my new traps and minions this time Mario!"

They walked through the castle, avoiding fire pillars, lava and the odd enemy. Then off in the distance they noticed a sparkly light coming at them. They tried to dodge it but Luigi was hit! Now normally they shrink down when they get hit and need a mushroom to gain back their height. But this was different. The spell had caused something else to happen when Luigi got hit. Magikoopa had been working on a new spell for the Mario Bros recently. That's what this was.

What did it do to Luigi?
13221.title: Heroes

132211.title: Changed him into a minion of Bowser's.

1322211.content: Is Bowser losing or gaining weight?
1322211.title: Weight

13222111.content: So everyone's favorite Koopa King is gaining weight. Is he his normal weight or a different weight
13222111.title: Gaining

choices: Looks up methods to gain weight
132221111.content:
It was another day in the Mushroom Kingdom. Mario and friends had just finished beating the snot out of Bowser for rudely crashing the party. Normally Bowser would take his bruises with pride and exact a revenge plot after getting home, but what really hit the head on the nail was Peach's increasing defiance. Lately she had been attacking Bowser on sight whenever he appeared to kidnap her. This however caused Bowser to question if his fantasy of inter-species marriage was only a delusion that was causing his kingdom to suffer. Deep down Bowser didn't want to admit his soon to be found hatred of Peach because that would mean begging his ex-wife to help him destroy Mario and co. and also being completely subjugated to his former flame via marriage for in Koopa society the queen always has the last say and Bowser had been trying so hard to rewrite the Koopa kingdom into a patriarch only to fail time and time again through multiple lawsuits from his ex. Bowser had managed to arrive home with no trouble at until he saw her.

"Hello Bowser, are you ready to admit that you're a complete idiot for divorcing me and that you need me to fix your mess?" The tall regal Koopa said in a condescending tone as she stood outside of the front door.

"Why would I give into a psychotic witch like you?" Bowser asked in a sarcastic tone.

"You still can't deny the fact that you still have feelings for me. Such feelings of affection are weakness. It's only through pure hatred that true power lies."

"Then that would make you a hypocrite."

"I will not be talked down to by an inferior Koopa like yourself."

"Inferior? You know that I'm your equal and you don't like to admit it."

"If that's how you want to play my tubby ex-hubby than so be it. Speaking of your weight you should stop trying to lose it. Your belly is what makes you so attractive." Bowser's ex said.

Bowser stood shocked at his ex's openness about how she felt about his weight.

"Later Bowser and I hope to hear from you soon."

Bowser then proceeded into his castle and started watching TV. It was during that time he came up with another plan. He thought what his ex said and considered his size. He pondered the fact that if he put on more weight it would be harder for Mario and his friends to defeat him. Bowser then grinned at the plan. He then...
132221111.title: Normal

What happens Next?!

1353111.title: Rock (MegaMan)

13531111.content: How does he get regressed?
13531111.title: Age Regression

135311111.content:
Rock, also known as MegaMan, was once again fighting Dr. Wily and his robots. This time, he was fighting a robot by the name of Llithro'nMan.*

"Come on, Lithro'nMan! You don't have to fight me! Dr.Light can take you and make you good," MegaMan exclaimed.

Lithro'nMan waggled his finger.

"No can do, MegaMan. Dr.Wily gave me strict orders to make sure you aren't able to get in our way anymore,"

He pulled a lever that locked MegaMan's feet in place.

"Nighty-Night, MegaMan! "

He shot at MegaMan, causing the boy to begin to regress.

"W-What's goin on!?"

"Dr.Wily found out how to make robots into baby versions of themselves."

"WHAT!?" MegaMan was stunned as he transformed into Rock and was now a nine year old version of himself, still regressing. Lithro'nMan laughed at the boy's fear.

Soon, Rock's regression stopped at.....

*Lithro'n is Welsh for regress.
135311111.title: One of Dr.Wily's robots

135322111.content: Where should this take place?
135322111.title: Laffer

13532211111.content:
Larry's quest for love begins at Lefty's bar. He has finally decided to move out of his mom's house and lose his virginity. However, his quest won't go as planned. Far from it. The ladies he will meet won't be normal, and the things that happen will be more life-changing than intended.

So, what does he do first?
13532211111.title: Larry

135322111111.content:
Larry enters Lefty's and looks around.

This is the sleaziest place I've ever been to, and I've been to plenty sleazy places, Larry thinks to himself.

Directly in front of him is the bar. Sitting at the bar is a man and a woman who appear to be somewhat romantically involved. In between them is an open seat. Next to the open seat are two dorks who somehow still look cooler than Larry.

Larry decides to....
135322111111.title: Enters Lefty's

1353221111111.content:
Larry decides to sit at the bar and greets the bartender

"What will it be? Beer, wine, whiskey?" Lefty inquires
1353221111111.title: Order a drink

13532211111111.content:
"Give me a mug o' beer!" Larry demands.

Lefty walks to the right and begins preparing the beer. While waiting for the beverage, Larry sits and listens to punchlines of jokes.

"...cause Thursday's your night in the barrel!" A man exclaims.

Lefty then returns with the beer and hands it to you.

"That'll be $3.00," Lefty states.

Larry slaps down the money in a psuedo-macho manor and then drinks the frothy mug of beer. He then begins to feel a little woozy.

"Hit me again!" Larry states.

"Comin' right up!" Lefty goes and prepares the beer.

"blah blah blah blah."

"...are we coming back this way?"

"Har! Har!"

Lefty then returns with another beer and sets it down.

"That'll be $3.00," Lefty states.

Larry once again slaps down the money in a psuedo-mach manor and drinks the frothy mug. He feels even more light-headed and woozy but thinks one more would be a good idea.

"One more round!" Larry orders Lefty.

Lefty then prepares another beer and brings it back as the dialogue and actions repeat. He then decides he's had enough and stands a little unbalanced. Larry feels rather odd all throughout his body. Two things are on his mind: Going to the bathroom or hitting on the girl.

What does he do?
13532211111111.title: Beer (AR)

135322111111112.content:
Larry decides to hit on the woman, despite (or maybe in his cause due to) the fact that he's pretty hammered.

"Hey, babe,wwwhat's your sign?" Larry slurs.

The woman looks at Larry in disgust.

"Get lost creep, before my boyfriend comes back from the bathroom!" She yells.

"Aw come on, babe. I'm just asking for your sign. Whaddaya say?" Larry rests his hand on her knee.

The woman prepares to slap Larry, but she then notices that Larry looks a bit different than before and is continuing to change. She then realizes that Larry was getting even smaller than he already was and possibly....younger?

"What in the world....." She states as she stares at a now 27 year old Larry.

However, the regression doesn't stop there. Larry continues regressing until he is....
135322111111112.title: Hits on the girl

1353221111111123.content:
"What's happening!?" A now teenage Larry yells.

The whole bar turns to look at Larry. Lefty is tempted to escort the now underage Larry out of the bar, but he has no idea what is going on with him and whether or not it's contagious.

With all eyes on him, Larry's regression ends at.....
1353221111111123.title: Younger

13532211111111231.content: He is now a child and is exactly
13532211111111231.title: Child (5-12)

135322111111112311.content: He is now a child at exactly age

13532211111111232.content: He is now a toddler at exactly age....
13532211111111232.title: Toddler (2-4)

choices: Take him back to her apartment.
135322111111112323.content:
Larry keeps on regressing until he is a two year old toddler, nearly buried by his leisure suit. Embarrassed, Larry blushes and begins to cry.

The woman looks down at Larry.

¨Oh...oh my,¨ she states.

Feeling sorry for the boy, she picks Larry up in his oversized leisure suit and rocks him.

¨Shh. It´s okay, sweetie.¨

Larry´s cries soon reduce to sniffles. The woman then wipes Larry´s tears.

¨It´s okay, sweetie. I´ll take care of you.¨

Suddenly, a wet spot begins to appear on Larry´s leisure suit. It becomes pretty obvious what´s going on: Larry is peeing on his leisure suit. The boy blushes and sniffles, noticing it leak onto the woman.

¨Sowwy...¨He squeaks.

The woman sighs.

¨It´s fine, sweetie. You can´t control it.¨

She then takes Larry outside, wrapped in his leisure suit.

¨What bout youw boyfwiend?¨

She giggles.

¨I lied to get you off my back, creep,¨ She pokes Larry´s nose, causing the boy to giggle.

¨By the way, I´m Victoria, and you are?¨

¨Wawwy, Wawwy Waffew.¨

¨Larry Laffer, huh? That´s a cute name.¨

Victoria decides to........

info.brief_description: Choose transformations for your fave anime and video game characters!
info.description:
Here is an interactive where you can write about your favourite anime and/or video game characters transforming into various things.
I won't delete much, but try to keep it PG 13...
